com.clouddevday
Class Startup

java.lang.Object
  TabActivity
      com.clouddevday.Startup

public class Startup
extends TabActivity

The Startup Class is used to initialize the Presentations class with data. It also initializes the main Tab Host for the applications and displays the Schedule Activity as the first Tab in the Tab Host. NOTE - It is the second Activity called in the start of the CloudDevDay Schedule application.

Author:
Don Ward

Field Summary
static int currentTab
          currentTab is an integer representing the current tab displayed.
static java.lang.String currentTimeSlot
          The currentTimeSlot member holds the value of the Current Displayed Time Slot Data for the TimeSlot Tab.
static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> presentation_titles
          presentation_titles is a HashMap where the key=presenter, value=presentation title

          presentations - represents all of the Presentations in the schedule
static java.lang.String[] scheduleItems
          scheduleItems is a array of the items to add to the ListView for the ScheduleActivity.

          timeSlotMap has key = String timeSlot, value = HashMap HashMap has key = room, value = presenter

          The timeSlots member holds the Time Slot Names for the Schedule.

Field Detail

currentTab

public static int currentTab
currentTab is an integer representing the current tab displayed. It is used by the TimeSlotActivity class to display the proper timeslot tab.

scheduleItems

public static java.lang.String[] scheduleItems
scheduleItems is a array of the items to add to the ListView for the ScheduleActivity.

timeSlotMap

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> timeSlotMap
timeSlotMap has key = String timeSlot, value = HashMap HashMap has key = room, value = presenter

presentation_titles

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> presentation_titles
presentation_titles is a HashMap where the key=presenter, value=presentation title

currentTimeSlot

public static java.lang.String currentTimeSlot
The currentTimeSlot member holds the value of the Current Displayed Time Slot Data for the TimeSlot Tab.

timeSlots

public static java.lang.String[] timeSlots
The timeSlots member holds the Time Slot Names for the Schedule.

presentations

public static Presentations presentations
presentations - represents all of the Presentations in the schedule

timeRoomsPresenters

public static java.lang.String[] timeRoomsPresenters
timeRoomPresenters is an array of the time/room/presenters combinations

onCreate() - Called when the activity is first created. It will create the tabs in the main Tab Host and create the activities displayed when they are selected.
